about_the_game:
This is a set of original costumes for characters of DOA5LR in western style. There are 17 costumes for 17 female characters.

This set contains costumes for the following characters:
Kasumi, Ayane, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Tina, Lisa, Helena, Christie, Mila, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka and Naotora Ii.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
*You need to own the relative character to use this content.
detailed_description:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
